Name: Mr. Barrel
About the game: Meet Mr. Barrel who sometimes works at a gas station, sometimes at a restaurant and sometimes fights against dark forces! A fast-paced highscore based game, comes forward with a unique idea as Mr. Barrel includes various liquids in himself and those liquids must be switched and used correctly. 4 different modes to play. (Each mode has 3 difficulty options.) Steam leaderboards to compare your scores with other players. 3 different characters to play with.
